description: GatewayZ Provider Directory - Track provider usage trends, traffic distribution, token consumption, latency metrics, and trace analysis

options.content:
## GatewayZ — Provider Directory
Per-provider analytics: traffic share, token consumption, latency, and health status across all 30+ integrated AI providers.

| Section | What it shows |
|---------|---------------|
| Traffic Distribution | Request volume and RPS per provider — monitors routing concentration risk (if OpenAI degrades, what fraction of traffic is affected?) |
| Token Consumption | Input and output token totals per provider — output tokens cost 3–5× more than input; growth here maps directly to billing |
| Latency Comparison | P95 response time per provider — surfaces consistently slow providers before users report degraded experience |
| Health Status | Up/down status and error rate per provider — used to decide whether to activate automatic failover routing |
